value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: SQL elastic pools allow you to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

images.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools

value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Azure Database for PostgreSQL provides fully managed, enterprise-ready community PostgreSQL database as a service. Learn how to create and deploy this service and connect it to your applications.

images.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

images.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB

images.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB

value.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: Integrate data sources with your Azure Functions serverless logic by using bindings.

images.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings

value.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
value.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

value.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a database app to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB by using Visual Studio Code.

images.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code

value.title: Deploy highly available solutions with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy highly available solutions with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability

value.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

images.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies
value.excerpt: Learn how to measure the throughput of your NoSQL database and assess the impact of partition key and indexing strategies on throughput.

images.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies

value.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
value.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

value.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
value.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API

value.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API
value.excerpt: Get lower latency, higher availability, and easier scaling by moving your Azure Storage Tables application to Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Use Azure Cache for Redis to store frequently accessed data. Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern.

images.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Interested in building end to end IoT solutions or about Azure IoT, but aren't quite sure what it can do for you? This path is the place to start.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
topItems.excerpt: Explain the essential characteristics of the IoT Edge and the functionality of the IoT Edge components (modules, runtime, and cloud interface). Characterize the types of problems that you can solve with IoT Edge.  Describe how the elements of IoT Edge can be combined to solve the problem of deploying IoT applications in the cloud.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

topItems.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
topItems.excerpt: Deploy a pre-built temperature simulator module to the edge using a container. The pre-built module will be deployed to an IoT edge device. You will check that the module was successfully created and deployed to the edge. You will view the simulated data from the deployed module.

images.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device

topItems.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

images.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

value.title: Implement a secure environment for a database service
value.excerpt: Implement SQL Server-based options for authentication and authorization, as well as Azure options for securing Azure SQL databases. Explore encryption, firewalls and advanced threat protection.

topItems.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
topItems.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

topItems.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
topItems.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

topItems.title: Implement compliance controls for sensitive data
topItems.excerpt: Explore data classification capabilities and degrees of confidentiality. Explore and configure advanced threat protection options, including SQL Injection.

value.title: Optimize query performance in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Analyze individual query performance and determine where improvements can be made. Explore performance-related Dynamic Management Objects. Investigate how indexes and database design affect queries.

topItems.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
topItems.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

topItems.title: Evaluate performance improvements
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

topItems.title: Explore performance-based design
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

value.title: Plan and implement a high availability and disaster recovery environment
value.excerpt: Data must be available when needed. Configure, test and manage a solution for high availability and disaster recovery using Azure tools and SQL Server tools.

topItems.title: Describe high availability and disaster recovery strategies
topItems.excerpt: Plan appropriate HA/DR strategy based on RTO and RPO. Choose best solution for IaaS or PaaS deployments or hybrid workloads.

topItems.title: Explore IaaS and PaaS platform tools for high availability and disaster recovery
topItems.excerpt: Deploy Windows Server Failover Cluster and AGs in Azure and hybrid environments. Configure temporal tables, geo-replication and auto failover groups.

topItems.title: Back up and restore databases
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement policy for recovering data in case of user error or failure of technology. Explore various options for how and where to backup and restore databases.

value.title: Plan and implement data platform resources
value.excerpt: Deploy data platform resources in Azure for SQL Server and Open Source databases. Explore options for upgrade and migration.  Calculate resource requirements and create templates.

topItems.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

topItems.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

topItems.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.

value.title: Putting it all together with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Putting it all together with Azure SQL
